title: Bonus 9: Portents of the Apocalypse
itunes:title: Bonus: Portents of the Apocalypse
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I introduce our new series on the apocalypse. We talk about the little-known but rich literature that flourished between the closing of the Old Testament, and the opening of the New Testament; and how it crucially influenced Judaism and Christianity.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I introduce our new series on the apocalypse. We talk about the little-known but rich literature that flourished between the closing of the Old Testament, and the opening of the New Testament; and how it crucially influenced Judaism and Christianity.
itunes:subtitle: The Apocalypse is coming!
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
